Reset Button: Allows users to reset the game and start over.

technologies: Styling: Bootstrap for modern and responsive design

title: Cards Generator
functionality: Random Card Generation: Generates a new random card each time the page is reloaded, every 5 seconds, or when the user clicks a button.
Multiple Card Generation: Allows users to generate multiple random cards at once.
Card Size Adjustment: Users can modify the width and height of the cards through input fields.
User Interface: Provides a visually appealing and intuitive interface using Bootstrap.
technologies: Styling: Bootstrap for modern and responsive design
purpose: The Cards Generator project is a personal initiative to create a dynamic and interactive random card generator. Developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, this project features multiple ways to generate random cards, including automatic intervals and user-initiated actions. It also allows for customization of card sizes, showcasing my ability to add complex functionalities and enhance user experience. This project demonstrates my problem-solving skills and my passion for learning and applying new programming concepts.
